benchmark_details.name: FLEXI
benchmark_details.overview: FLEXI is the first benchmark for full-duplex LLMâ€“human spoken interaction that explicitly incorporates model interruption in emergency scenarios. It systematically evaluates the latency, quality, and conversational effectiveness of real-time dialogue through six diverse human-LLM interaction scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the naturalness, seamlessness, and intelligence of S2S LLMs in full-duplex interaction scenarios.

data.source: Synthetic data generated with advanced LLMs and synthesized into speech.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the defined evaluation metrics such as TOR, TTR, etc.
methodology.interpretation: Good performance is indicated by high rates in TOR, TTR, and other specified metrics.
